icon.nbt: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Resonance Sigil\",\"color\":\"yellow\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"An imprint upon your body to enable","color":"gray"}','{"text":"sacrifice at a resonating crystal.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Use at the lyceum\'s central terrace","color":"gray"}','{"text":"to prepare the crystal and beckon","color":"gray"}','{"text":"forth your final challenger.","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:4,Damage:4,HoldingID:57,CustomModelData:4}
